Exploring interactive Quarto features for embedding in Skilljar.

## Test Pages

- [Palmer Penguins Explorer](penguins.qmd) -- Static R output with ggplot2 plots, gt summary tables, and Bootstrap tabsets.
- [WebR Demo](webr.qmd) -- Run and edit R code directly in the browser, no server or installation needed.
- [Shinylive Demo](shinylive.qmd) -- A fully client-side Shiny app with reactive sliders and live plots.
- [Quiz Demo](quiz.qmd) -- Interactive knowledge checks with live code editors and collapsible answers.
- [Running Code in Posit Workbench](video.qmd) -- Video walkthrough of running R and Python code and managing jobs in Posit Workbench.
